title: An Idea about summoner icon
body: Just add a feature so we can know when we bought this icon, I like to collect my summoner icons but I can not remember some of the icons. Are this one from season one or from which event or who gifted it to me.

replies.body: Totally, I want this! Rito plz!

it\ll even be nicer to know the % of the population that has this icon and how it was obtained. Maybe a way for others to hover over it during loading screen to let people know how rare it is. 

I dig my Perfect Ascension icon and want to show it off, but not everyone knows how hard / rare it is to obtain.
Do you have any chance to that Riot know this? :)
Yeah, a date beside it can be great to see when we bought these icons. especially with the new client.
There's a whole topic about this somewhere [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/wiki/riotpls).
That would be nice :), so I can see when I bought my icons as part of my memory.
